thread.section_title: eDreams opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre eDreams | www.edreams.es | 3 de 66
thread.title: Mr. Villiers Chillcott
thread.title_full: eDreams evaluado por Mr. Villiers Chillcott

author: Mr. Villiers Chillcott
title: Mr. Villiers Chillcott
text:
I made a silly blunder when making my eDreams flight reservation. Abishek was most gracious when dealing with my plea to make the necessary change, immediately refunded the incorrect leg of my booking and left me free to rebook as I wished.
Thank you so much, Abishek - I really am most grateful. :-)
